amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability and Efficiency (for water power energy) by $31 million and to decrease funding for Departmental Administration by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability and Efficiency account by 31 million and decrease the Departmental Administration account by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 140 - 275 (Roll no. 314).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 140 - 275 (Roll no. 314).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Perry.
